channel.title: Make Items Not Drop able on Death
channel.description: How would i make items not be drop able on death like primal and torva and stuff like stuff thats donor i dont want to be able to be dropped or dropped on death like they keep it or it disappears.

item.description:
@DannyBoy1995 wrote:

[quote=“I need a username, post:7, topic:397115”]Where on this page do you see Element-X?
I dont see it[/quote]
Im using a 317 PI

item.title: Make Items Not Drop able on Death
item.dc:creator: @Marine5287 Marine5287
item.description:
@Marine5287 wrote:

[quote=“I need a username, post:5, topic:397115”]Blah Blah: How would i make items not be drop able on death like primal and torva and stuff like stuff thats donor i dont want to be able to be dropped or dropped on death like they keep it or it disappears.

English: How could i make items that are donator only, not to drop when a donor dies, so little free noobs don’t come and pick them up and show off.

My Response: What server are you running, 317, 508, ETC. Be Specific[/quote]

Element-X is a 562.

Read full topic

item.title: Make Items Not Drop able on Death
item.dc:creator: @I_need_a_username I need a username

@I_need_a_username wrote:

Blah Blah: How would i make items not be drop able on death like primal and torva and stuff like stuff thats donor i dont want to be able to be dropped or dropped on death like they keep it or it disappears.

English: How could i make items that are donator only, not to drop when a donor dies, so little free noobs don’t come and pick them up and show off.

My Response: What server are you running, 317, 508, ETC. Be Specific
